channel.title: The best troll i ever did
channel.description:
[img]http://img51.imageshack.us/img51/3051/17428095.png[/img]
:3 and she deleted all her posts after she got caught. so bail would not see her ignorance.
:3 but i caught her and posted it on bails wall, shes gunna have a good time explaining it.
gunna be fun.

Saying that god made Adam and Eve, not Steve is just saying that Adam wasn’t homosexual. Even if it’s against her religion to be gay, that doesn’t mean lash out at everyone who is, I thought religious people were supposed to love their neighbors as themselves or something like that?

item.title: The best troll i ever did
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:6, topic:429190”][quote author=mironic link=topic=531883.msg3886849#msg3886849 date=1326512185]

I don’t get what the point of this was aside from the point you have a furry set as your profile picture.

oh, let me explain. the bitch said it was okay to “like” and laugh at other peoples heartbreak if they are in highschool. it was posted on bailys “in a relationship” > “single” post. she then said you cant have a real heartbreak till your 20… then the story continues on the picture
[/quote]Makes sense then. I didn’t exactly get the “Face Break” thing until you said that.

Good on ya then. I hate people who act so condescending like that.[/quote]
i know
